FastDecoder.cc

00001 #include "FastDecoder.hh"
00002 
00003 
00004 #include <iomanip>
00005 #include <sstream>
00006 #include <cmath>
00007 
00008 namespace CALICE {
00009 
00010   FastDecoder* FastDecoder::generateDecoder(const std::string& encoding, const std::string& variableName) {
00011 
00012     unsigned int position=0;
00013     unsigned int mask=0;
00014     int offset=0;
00015     bool isSigned=false;
00016 
00017     unsigned int currentPosition = 0;
00018 
00019     std::stringstream stream;
00020     if (encoding == "")  throw WrongDataFormatException(std::string("encoding string cannot be empty\n"));
00021     stream << encoding;
00022     std::string token="";
00023     while ( ! ( stream.fail() | stream.eof() ) )
00024       {
00025         //std::cout<<" \nFastDecoder: encoding="<<encoding<<std::endl;
00026 
00027         std::getline(stream, token, ',');
00028         std::size_t firstSep = token.find(':');
00029         int size = 0;
00030 
00031         //check if relative or absolute position
00032         std::size_t secondSep = token.find(':',firstSep+1);
00033         if (secondSep == std::string::npos)
00034           {
00035             std::stringstream converterSize;
00036             converterSize << token.substr(firstSep+1);
00037 
00038             if ((converterSize >> size).fail())
00039               {
00040                 std::stringstream errormessage;
00041                 errormessage << "cannot convert size "<< converterSize.str() << " to integer " << std::endl;
00042                 throw  WrongDataFormatException( errormessage.str() );
00043               }
00044             if (size>0) currentPosition += size;
00045             else currentPosition -= size;
00046             //      std::cout << "relative position increased to " << currentPosition << std::endl;
00047           }
00048         else
00049           {
00050             std::stringstream converterSize;
00051             converterSize << token.substr(secondSep+1);
00052 
00053             if ((converterSize >> size).fail())
00054               {
00055                 std::stringstream errormessage;
00056                 errormessage << "cannot convert size "<< converterSize.str() << " to integer " << std::endl;
00057                 throw  WrongDataFormatException( errormessage.str() );
00058               }
00059 
00060 
00061             std::stringstream converterPosition;
00062             converterPosition << token.substr(firstSep+1,secondSep-firstSep-1);
00063             if ((converterPosition >> currentPosition).fail()) {
00064               std::stringstream errormessage;
00065               errormessage << "cannot convert position "<< converterPosition.str() << " to integer " << std::endl;
00066               throw  WrongDataFormatException( errormessage.str() );
00067             }
00068             currentPosition += size;
00069           }
00070 
00071         //      std::cout<<" FastDecoder: variableName: "<<variableName<<" bool1: "<<(token.substr(0,firstSep).find(variableName) == 0)
00072         //               <<" bool2: "<<(token.find_first_of("+-:") == variableName.size())
00073         //               <<std::endl;
00074         //      std::cout<<"   token="<<token<<" firstStep="<<firstSep<<" token.subr: "<<token.substr(0,firstSep)<<std::endl;
00075 
00076         if (token.substr(0,firstSep).find(variableName) == 0 && token.find_first_of("+-:") == variableName.size() )
00077           { //starts with the searched name and next is one of +-:
00078 
00079             std::string identifier = token.substr(0,firstSep);
00080 
00081             //check for offset
00082             if (identifier.size() > variableName.size()) {
00083               std::stringstream converter;
00084               converter << identifier.substr(variableName.size());
00085               if ((converter >> offset).fail()) {
00086                 std::stringstream errormessage;
00087                 errormessage << "cannot convert offset "<< converter.str() << " to integer " << std::endl;
00088                 throw  WrongDataFormatException( errormessage.str() );
00089               }
00090             }
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094             if (size < 0 ) {
00095               isSigned = true;
00096               mask = (unsigned int)pow(2,-size)-1;
00097             }
00098             else {
00099               isSigned = false;
00100               mask = (unsigned int)pow(2,size)-1;
00101             }
00102 
00103             position=currentPosition-size;
00104             /*
00105               std::cout << "found " ;
00106               if (isSigned) std::cout << " signed ";
00107               else std::cout << "unsigned ";
00108               std::cout << variableName << " at " << position << " size: " << size <<" mask: " << std::hex << mask << " with offset " << std::dec << offset << std::endl;
00109             */
00110             //std::cout<<" FastDecoder: end"<<std::endl;
00111 
00112             return new FastDecoder(position,mask,isSigned,offset);
00113           }
00114 
00115 
00116       }
00117     return 0;
00118   }
00119 }
